tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    mood VARCHAR(50),
    tempo VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES playlists(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE music_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    artist VARCHAR(50),
    favorite_song VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    therapist_id INT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    playlist_id INT,
    preference_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(50),
    artist_name VARCHAR(50),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    playlist_id INT,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(50),
    session_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE playlists (
    playlist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    playlist_name VARCHAR(100),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    songs JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE music_preferences (
    preference_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    artist VARCHAR(100),
    tempo VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    health_condition VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE therapy_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    therapist_id UUID,
    session_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE therapists (
    therapist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    therapist_name VARCHAR(100),
    specialty VARCHAR(100),
    experience_years INT,
    contact_info JSONB
)
